pair.title: Add Mi Home device
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the fields.
pair.intro: Enter the details of your Mi Home device.
pair.token: Token (32 characters of numbers and letters)
pair.testing: Connection test successfull, you can now connect the device.
pair.testingVacuum: Mi Robot find message send succesfully, did you hear the Mi Robot?
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct IP address and token and that Homey is on the same network as the Mi Home device? Please check your settings and try again.
